title: 820-3662 board , no audio , no speaker detect and no headphone detect
message:
hi, 
                 had  a damaged jack  on board , before replacement it was not detecting the jack or speakers and had a greyed out volume icon , also upon fitting the new one still does not detect any headphones and  speakers . any possibilities of testing some outputs from u6201 to determine if u6201 is faulty and needs reflow or replacment . 
kindly advise 
thanks

title: 820-3662 board , no audio , no speaker detect and no headphone detect
message: Does it chime? PRAM reset to be sure.

title: 820-3662 board , no audio , no speaker detect and no headphone detect
message:
hi , 
         it does not chime and also upon Pram reset it does not chime . 
thanks

title: 820-3662 board , no audio , no speaker detect and no headphone detect
message: Likely there is either parts knocked off around U6201 or balls/traces under U6201 got ripped up by the force when the jack was broken. Check some voltages around U6201 first, 3V and 4.5V.
